      • updateCell

        public boolean updateCell​(int x,
                          int y)
        Tell us if you should update a cell.
        Parameters:
        x - is the x coordinate of the cell
        y - is the y coordinate of the cell
        Returns:
        Boolean True if we should update the cell and False if not

      • getToChangeList

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> getToChangeList()
        Return the map of the coordinate of the cells to change.
        Returns:
        a dictionnary having two list of integer (X and Y) When updating our list we juts change the cells that have changed. Thus we gain in performance instead of looking for the element.

      • updateGrid

        public void updateGrid​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> map)
        Update the grid by just checking the coordinate of the changed cell.
        Parameters:
        map - is the map giving the list of the coordinate X with the key x_coord list of the coordinate Y with the key y_coord
